topic.title: anonying open site popups. pls help
topic.body:
I got this "You have opened this page by clicking on a link. Please, confirm if you want to load this site." even when I refresh my site. and with click link too..

After search in code I found it there in https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/blob/master/src/Ui/media/Wrapper.coffee line 76.

It seems that only I have this problem after asking around.. is it a local mozilla setting thing ? and how can I shut it down.  it is annoying cos when I click "open site" then all the http paremeters are missing. 

Thx in advance!

topic.title: Favorited sites last item menu not shown
topic.body:
Very strange... 

I run Firefox and Chrome. zeronet rev1755. both of them has this problem.

the last item from favorited sites menu not shown.  so can not clone or do any else action.

topic.title: merger site error
topic.body:
Internal error: Exception: Merger site (PPLOAD) does not have permission for merged site: 158dmVopMVaDNoqMPC3N77pEjbbdSh3noi

local testing no problem.
bit.no.com got error.

any idea ? thank a lot in advance.

topic.title: site publish problem...
topic.body:
after site publish, seems html/js are published.. but db not... 

Help please.
```
- Loading site...
- Creating FileServer....
TorManager Tor controller connect error: error: [Errno 111] Connection refused in TorManager.py line 154 > socket.py line 342
FileServer StreamServer bind error, must be running already: [Errno 98] Address already in use: ('', 15441)
- Sending siteReload
- {'to': 1, 'cmd': 'response', 'ok': 'Reloaded'}
- Sending sitePublish
- {'to': 2, 'cmd': 'response', 'ok': 'Successfuly published to 3 peers'}
- Done.
```

topic.title: Question about siteSetAutodownloadoptional
topic.body:
I would like to have a button on site which allow user download all the optional files...  
How can I call this function siteSetAutodownloadoptional in js ? 

examples are appreciated...

topic.title: Bug report: the cloned site has siteInfo.setttings.size_optional = -220MB
topic.body: the clone site has wrong size_optional Info.

topic.title: mergerSiteList: Merger site does not have permission for merged site
topic.body:
Hi... I have a problem with mergerSiteList... 

Please help. 
Thanks in advance.

this Internal error comes out when merged site not yet locally loaded. 
when  run Page.cmd("mergerSiteList", {query_site_info: true}, function(sites) {}); the merged site is not in sites.

Internal error: Exception: Merger site does not have permission for merged site: 19QwKp4zjaEWjLZ7pAkC2s9mswa2pxAEVV
UiWebsocket.py line 99 > UiWebsocket.py line 182 > MergerSitePlugin.py line 137 > MergerSitePlugin.py line 119 > MergerSitePlugin.py line 32

1604065520_mirrored_siyuandong_github.body:
here is my site.
1HrBmidiq34bcHaDAdQWC37ne6Scu8euQN
when I click the link inside the page I see the popups. 

I use ZeroFrame.js ZeroChat.js

got error.

13:57:38.245 The connection to ws://127.0.0.1:43110/Websocket?wrapper_key=7e14d9be96e9beaacaed17d1c0b40ef0fcaab9adc4847ff83ed4ce8cbb518e52 was interrupted while the page was loading.1 all.js:40:16

[Wrapper] Message nonce error: undefined != 73b55c44553e90763eec746a73a31b1bf5692e0006aba5f39ac94628af5517e9 all.js:1357:14
o...sorry. now compiled. got Class not found error.

@HelloZeroNet 

Thank you very much! it is working !!!

only curious,  I tested on my mac machine and it has no popups even without adding "postmessage_nonce_security": true.  and my friend has Ubuntu dont have this popup either. why this only happen to my computer (linux mint + firefox) ?

1604065594_mirrored_siyuandong_github.body: I deleted browsers local storage, the favorited sites goes back to the list,  menu appear again.. seems only happen to Favorited Sites ' s Last menu .
dont know why.. seems working now.
seems only happens to favorite this site: 1LK6eAVVsRscLCTQqEHhrvLXACaDcWUrU1

1604065617_mirrored_siyuandong_github.body: seems /data/user/content.json changed while site sign/publish wrongly...very strange.. after copy /data/user/contenet.json again, merger works... close issue for this moment.

1604065621_mirrored_siyuandong_github.body:
thx for replying.... 
the problem is that I have 4 registerd merge pages.  I can see them on /data/user/xxxxxxxxx...... now sth went wrong.. I delete 2 of them.  and  dbRebuild. and restart zeronet and publish the site...

On my own local site they disappeard.. but on some peers not. bit.no either.... 

what can I do to make the changes published. 


THX A LOT!!!!

https://bit.no.com:43110/12MVkvYGcRW6u2NYbpfwVad1oQeyG4s9Er/

this is my site.. the content are deleted locally..  but now syn... how can I get them syn...
yes. that is what I did. I even delete the user's whole directory which include .json files... but the peers could not get update.... I edit the index.html too and it could get updated...

could be somthing to do with my router... fileserver checking port 15441... and 15441 is not open..

fileServer Internet offline.

yeah... I did the first suggestion  sign and publish data/users/useraddress/content.json.... it works.

Thank you so much. very helpful!
